### cycleStart() {#a30c31c2bca81aa1895a9f01692838568}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="llvm::Error llvm::mca::EntryStage::cycleStart ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called once at the start of each cycle.

This can be used as a setup phase to prepare for the executions during the cycle.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/entrystage-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/entrystage-h">EntryStage.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/lib/mca/stages/entrystage-cpp/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/lib/mca/stages/entrystage-cpp">EntryStage.cpp</a>.
